citations.narrative:
The last head to tail physical exam by the attending veterinarian of all dogs at the facility was done on 7/21/2023. These
exams are now overdue. A complete head to tail physical exam must be done by the veterinarian every 12 months. This
exam is important to ensure all dogs at the facility are in good health and that medical conditions are addressed in a
timely manner. Have these physical exams done by the facility attending veterinarian.
Correct by: 2/28/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The last head to tail physical exam by the attending veterinarian of all dogs at the facility was done on 7/21/2023. These 
exams are now overdue. A complete head to tail physical exam must be done by the veterinarian every 12 months. This 
exam is important to ensure all dogs at the facility are in good health and that medical conditions are addressed in a 
timely manner. Have these physical exams done by the facility attending veterinarian. 
Correct by: 2/28/2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
